    • addRestaurant

      public java.lang.String addRestaurant​(java.lang.String nameRestaurant, java.lang.String nitRestaurant, java.lang.String nameCeo, java.lang.String operator) throws java.io.IOException
      Name: addRestaurant Method used to register a restaurant in the list of restaurants of the system.
      pre: List of restaurants already initialized.
      post: Registry process determined of the restaurant in question in the list of restaurants of the system.
      Parameters:
      nameRestaurant - - restaurant name - nameRestaurant = String, nameRestaurant != null, nameRestaurant != ""
      nitRestaurant - - restaurant NIT - nitRestaurant = String, nitRestaurant != null, nitRestaurant != ""
      nameCeo - - restaurant administrator - nameCeo = String, nameCeo != null, nameCeo != ""
      operator - - restaurant operator - operator = String, operator != null, operator != ""
      Returns:
      A String with a message about the successful adding process of the restaurant to the list of restaurants of the system; or, a String with a message about an error because the restaurant already exists in the system.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - if it cannot write the file properly while saving after adding a restaurant.

    • addRestaurantForTest

      public java.lang.String addRestaurantForTest​(java.lang.String nameRestaurant, java.lang.String nitRestaurant, java.lang.String nameCeo, java.lang.String operator)
      Name: addRestaurantForTest Method used in a JUnit Test for testing the registration of a restaurant in the list of restaurants of the system, without serializing this list in the test.
      pre: List of restaurants already initialized.
      post: Registry process determined of the restaurant in question in the list of restaurants of the system.
      Parameters:
      nameRestaurant - - restaurant name - nameRestaurant = String, nameRestaurant != null, nameRestaurant != ""
      nitRestaurant - - restaurant NIT - nitRestaurant = String, nitRestaurant != null, nitRestaurant != ""
      nameCeo - - restaurant administrator - nameCeo = String, nameCeo != null, nameCeo != ""
      operator - - restaurant operator - operator = String, operator != null, operator != ""
      Returns:
      A String with a message about the successful adding process of the restaurant to the list of restaurants of the system; or, a String with a message about an error because the restaurant already exists in the system.

    • searchRestaurant

      public Restaurant searchRestaurant​(java.lang.String nitRestaurant)
      Name: searchRestaurant Method used to search a restaurant in the list of restaurants of the system.
      pre: List of restaurants already initialized.
      post: Searching process determined of the restaurant in question in the list of restaurants registered in the system.
      Parameters:
      nitRestaurant - - restaurant NIT - nitRestaurant = String, nitRestaurant != null, nitRestaurant != ""
      Returns:
      A Restaurant object different from null if the restaurant in question was found in the system, or with null if not.

    • addProduct

      public java.lang.String addProduct​(java.lang.String codeProduct, java.lang.String nameProduct, java.lang.String description, double cost, java.lang.String nitRestaurant, double content, int amountOrdered) throws java.io.IOException
      Name: addProduct Method used to register a product in the list of products of the system.
      pre: List of products already initialized and at least one restaurant is registered in the system.
      post: Registry process determined of the product in question in the list of products of the system.
      Parameters:
      codeProduct - - Product code - codeProduct = String, codeProduct != null, codeProduct != ""
      nameProduct - - Product name - nameProduct = String, nameProduct != null, nameProduct != ""
      description - - Product description - description = String, description != null, description != ""
      cost - - Product cost - cost = double, cost != null, cost != 0
      nitRestaurant - - NIT of the restaurant product owner - nitRestaurant = String, nitRestaurant != null, nitRestaurant != ""
      content - - Product content - content = double, content != null, content != 0
      amountOrdered - - Ordered units of the product when an order is going to be placed - amountOrdered = int, amountOrdered != null
      Returns:
      A String with a message about the successful adding process of the product to the list of products of the system; or, a String with a message about an error because the product already exists in the system; or, a String with a message about an error because the restaurant doesn't exist in the system.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - if it cannot write the file properly while saving after adding a product.

    • addClient

      public java.lang.String addClient​(java.lang.String typeDocument, java.lang.String idClient, java.lang.String lastNameClient, java.lang.String nameClient, java.lang.String phone, java.lang.String address) throws java.io.IOException
      Name: addClient Method used to register/insert a client in an orderly way by its last name and its name, in the list of clients of the system.
      pre: List of clients already initialized.
      post: Registry process determined of the client in question in the list of clients of the system.
      Parameters:

      idClient - - Client ID number - idClient = String, idClient != null, idClient != ""
      lastNameClient - - Client last name - lastNameClient = String, lastNameClient != null, lastNameClient != ""
      nameClient - - Client name - nameClient = String, nameClient != null, nameClient != ""
      phone - - Client phone - phone = String, phone != null, phone != ""
      address - - Client address - address = String, address != null, address != ""
      Returns:
      A String with a message about the successful adding process of the client to the list of clients of the system; or, a String with a message about an error because the client already exists in the system.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - if it cannot write the file properly while saving after adding a client.

    • searchFastlyAClient

      public java.lang.String searchFastlyAClient​(java.lang.String nameClient) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Name: searchFastlyAClient Method used to search efficiently a client with his/her in the list of clients of the system, through binary search.
      pre: List of clients already initialized.
      post: Searching process determined of the client in question in the list of clients registered in the system, and the search time is given.
      Parameters:
      nameClient - - Client name - nameClient = String, nameClient != null, nameClient != ""
      Returns:
      A String with a message saying that the client was found, and the time the system took to find him/her; or, a String with a message saying that the client wasn't found in the list of clients of the system.
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - - when a thread is waiting, sleeping, or otherwise occupied, and the thread is interrupted, either before or during the activity.

    • addOrder

      public java.lang.String addOrder​(int codeOrder, java.util.Date dateTime, java.lang.String idClient, java.lang.String nitRestaurant, java.lang.String status, java.util.List<Product> productsOrdered) throws java.io.IOException
      Name: addOrder Method used to register an order in the list of orders of the system.
      pre: List of orders already initialized; list of restaurants already initialized with at least one restaurant registered; list of products already initialized with at least one product registered; list of clients already initialized with at least one client registered.
      post: Registry process determined of the order in question in the list of orders of the system.
      Parameters:
      codeOrder - - Order code - codeOrder = int, codeOrder != null, codeOrder != 0
      dateTime - - Date and time of order creation - dateTime = Date, dateTime != null
      idClient - - Client ID number - idClient = String, idClient != null, idClient != ""
      nitRestaurant - - Restaurant NIT - nitRestaurant = String, nitRestaurant != null, nitRestaurant != ""
      status - - Order status - status = String, status != null, status != ""
      productsOrdered - - List of products from the order - productsOrdered = List of Product class, productsOrdered != null
      Returns:
      A String with a message about the successful adding process of the order to the list of orders of the system; or, a String with a message about an error because the order already exists in the system.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - if it cannot write the file properly while saving after adding an order.

    • addOrderImporting

      public java.lang.String addOrderImporting​(int codeOrder, java.util.Date dateTime, java.lang.String idClient, java.lang.String nitRestaurant, java.lang.String status, java.util.List<Product> productsOrdered) throws java.io.IOException
      Name: addOrderImporting Method used to register an order in the list of orders of the system, when importing it.
      pre: List of orders already initialized; list of restaurants already initialized with at least one restaurant registered; list of products already initialized with at least one product registered; list of clients already initialized with at least one client registered.
      post: Registry process determined of the order in question in the list of orders of the system.
      Parameters:
      codeOrder - - Order code - codeOrder = int, codeOrder != null, codeOrder != 0
      dateTime - - Date and time of order creation - dateTime = Date, dateTime != null
      idClient - - Client ID number - idClient = String, idClient != null, idClient != ""
      nitRestaurant - - Restaurant NIT - nitRestaurant = String, nitRestaurant != null, nitRestaurant != ""
      status - - Order status - status = String, status != null, status != ""
      productsOrdered - - List of products from the order - productsOrdered = List of Product class, productsOrdered != null
      Returns:
      A String with a message about the successful adding process of the order to the list of orders of the system; or, a String with a message about an error because the order already exists in the system.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - if it cannot write the file properly while saving after adding an order.

    • searchOrder

      public Order searchOrder​(int codeOrder)
      Name: searchOrder Method used to search an order in the list of orders of the system.
      pre: List of orders already initialized.
      post: Searching process determined of the order in question in the list of orders registered in the system.
      Parameters:
      codeOrder - - Order code - codeOrder = int, codeOrder != null, codeOrder != 0
      Returns:
      An Order object different from null if the order in question was coincidentally found in the system (even if it's a randomly generated code), or with null if not.

    • setDataRestaurant

      public java.lang.String setDataRestaurant​(java.lang.String nitRestaurant, int attribute, java.lang.String newValue) throws java.io.IOException
      Name: setDataRestaurant Method used to update the data from a restaurant registered in the list of restaurants of the system.
      pre: List of restaurants already initialized with at least one restaurant registered.
      post: Updating process determined of the data from the restaurant in question registered in the list of restaurants of the system.
      Parameters:
      nitRestaurant - - restaurant NIT - nitRestaurant = String, nitRestaurant != null, nitRestaurant != ""
      attribute - - The specified attribute to be changed of the restaurant in question - attribute = int, attribute != null, attribute is a number from 1 to 4.
      newValue - - The new value that the String attribute to change will take - newValue = String, newValue != null, newValue != ""
      Returns:
      A String with a message about the successful updating process of the data from the restaurant registered in the list of restaurants of the system.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - if it cannot write the file properly while saving after updating an information from a restaurant.

    • setDataProduct

      public java.lang.String setDataProduct​(java.lang.String codeProduct, int attribute, java.lang.String newValue1, double newValue2) throws java.io.IOException
      Name: setDataProduct Method used to update the data from a product registered in the list of products of the system.
      pre: List of products already initialized with at least one product registered.
      post: Updating process determined of the data from the product in question registered in the list of products of the system.
      Parameters:
      codeProduct - - Product code - codeProduct = String, codeProduct != null, codeProduct != ""
      attribute - - The specified attribute to be changed of the product in question - attribute = int, attribute != null, attribute is a number from 1 to 6.
      newValue1 - - Variable to be used for new String values from the String attributes of the product - newValue1 = String, newValue1 != null, newValue1 != ""
      newValue2 - - Variable to be used for new double values from the double attributes of the product - newValue2 = String, newValue2 != null, newValue2 != ""
      Returns:
      A String with a message about the successful updating process of the data from the product registered in the list of products of the system.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - if it cannot write the file properly while saving after updating an information from a product.

    • setDataClient

      public java.lang.String setDataClient​(java.lang.String idClient, int attribute, java.lang.String newValue) throws java.io.IOException, NonLogicalDocumentTypeException
      Name: setDataClient Method used to update the data from a client registered in the list of clients of the system.
      pre: List of clients already initialized with at least one client registered.
      post: Updating process determined of the data from the client in question registered in the list of clients of the system.
      Parameters:
      idClient - - Client ID number - idClient = String, idClient != null, idClient != ""
      attribute - - The specified attribute to be changed of the client in question - attribute = int, attribute != null, attribute is a number from 1 to 6.
      newValue - - The new value that the String attribute to change will take - newValue = String, newValue != null, newValue != ""
      Returns:
      A String with a message about the successful updating process of the data from the client registered in the list of clients of the system.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - if it cannot write the file properly while saving after updating an information from a client.
      NonLogicalDocumentTypeException - - if the new value chosen to update the document type attribute from a client isn't logical.

    • setDataOrder

      public java.lang.String setDataOrder​(int codeOrder, int attribute, java.lang.String newValue, java.lang.String newStatus, java.lang.String codeProduct, int action, int amountOrdered, java.lang.String searchNit, int removeAction, int amountToRemove) throws NonLogicalStatusException, java.io.IOException
      Name: setDataOrder Method used to update the data from an order registered in the list of orders of the system.
      pre: List of orders already initialized with at least one order registered.
      post: Updating process determined of the data from the order in question registered in the list of orders of the system.
      Parameters:
      codeOrder - - Order code - codeOrder = String, codeOrder != null, codeOrder != ""
      attribute - - The specified attribute to be changed of the order in question - attribute = int, attribute != null, attribute is a number from 1 to 4.
      newValue - - The new value that the Client ID number and the Restaurant NIT both will take - newValue = String, newValue != null, newValue != ""
      newStatus - - The new value that the status attribute of an order will take - newStatus = String, newStatus != null, newStatus != ""
      codeProduct - - Product code - codeProduct = String, codeProduct != null, codeProduct != ""
      action - - The specified chosen action to do when updating the list of products from the order - action = int, action != null, action is a number from 1 to 2.
      amountOrdered - - Ordered units of a product - amountOrdered = int, amountOrdered != null, amountOrdered != 0
      searchNit - - Restaurant NIT - searchNit = String, searchNit != null, searchNit != ""
      removeAction - - The specified chosen action to do when removing a product from the list of products of the order - removeAction = int, removeAction != null, removeAction is a number from 1 to 2.
      amountToRemove - - Units to remove from a product present in the list of products from an order - amountToRemove = int, amountToRemove != null
      Returns:
      A String with a message about the successful updating process of the data from the order registered in the list of orders of the system.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - if it cannot write the file properly while saving after updating an information from an order.
      NonLogicalStatusException - - if the new value chosen to update the status attribute from an order isn't logical.

    • addProductsInOrder

      public java.lang.String addProductsInOrder​(java.lang.String codeProduct, int codeOrder, int amountOrdered, java.lang.String searchNit)
      Name: addProductsInOrder Method used to register a product in the list of products from an order.
      pre: List of products from the order already exists and at least one product was registered before in this list.
      post: Registry process determined of the product in question in the list of products from the order.
      Parameters:
      codeProduct - - Product code - codeProduct = String, codeProduct != null, codeProduct != ""
      codeOrder - - Order code - codeOrder = String, codeOrder != null, codeOrder != ""
      searchNit - - Restaurant NIT - searchNit = String, searchNit != null, searchNit != ""
      amountOrdered - - Ordered units of a product - amountOrdered = int, amountOrdered != null, amountOrdered != 0
      Returns:
      A String with a message about the successful adding process of the product to the list of products from the order; or, a String with a message about an error because the product doesn't exist in the system OR it isn't offered by the specified chosen restaurant.

    • searchProductInOrder

      public Product searchProductInOrder​(java.lang.String codeProduct, int codeOrder)
      Name: searchProductInOrder Method used to search the existence of a product in the list of products from an order.
      pre: List of products from the order already exists and at least one product was registered before in this list.
      post: Searching process determined of the product in question in the list of products from the order.
      Parameters:
      codeProduct - - Product code - codeProduct = String, codeProduct != null, codeProduct != ""
      codeOrder - - Order code - codeOrder = String, codeOrder != null, codeOrder != ""
      Returns:
      A Product object different from null if the product in question was found in the list of products from the order, or with null if not.

    • removeProductFromOrder

      public java.lang.String removeProductFromOrder​(java.lang.String codeProduct, int codeOrder, int removeAction, int amountToRemove)
      Name: removeProductFromOrder Method used to remove a product from the list of products of an order.
      pre: List of products from the order already exists and at least one product was registered before in this list.
      post: Removing process determined of the product in question from the list of products of the order.
      Parameters:
      codeProduct - - Product code - codeProduct = String, codeProduct != null, codeProduct != ""
      codeOrder - - Order code - codeOrder = String, codeOrder != null, codeOrder != ""
      removeAction - - The specified chosen action to do when removing a product from the list of products of the order - removeAction = int, removeAction != null, removeAction is a number from 1 to 2.
      amountToRemove - - Units to remove from a product present in the list of products from an order - amountToRemove = int, amountToRemove != null
      Returns:
      A String with a message about the successful removing process of the product from the list of products of the order; and, if it was the unique product present in this list, also with a message about the removing process of this order due to absence of products in its list of products.

    • importData

      public java.lang.String importData​(java.lang.String fileName, int data) throws java.io.IOException, java.text.ParseException
      Name: importData Method used to import external data from restaurants, products, clients or orders.
      pre: List of orders already initialized; list of restaurants already initialized; list of products already initialized; list of clients already initialized.
      post: Importing process determined of the external data from restaurants, products, clients or orders.
      Parameters:
      fileName - - File name from the external data in question that will be read - fileName = String, fileName != null, fileName != ""
      data - - Variable to specify what is it going to be imported - data = int, data != null, data is a number from 1 to 4.
      Returns:
      Eventually a message if an object from Restaurant, Product or Client class didn't exist while it was trying to import.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - if it cannot write a file properly while saving after importing and then adding a restaurant, a product, a client or an order.
      java.text.ParseException - - signals that an error has been reached unexpectedly while parsing.

    • orderRepeatedInFile

      public int orderRepeatedInFile​(java.lang.String codeOrder, java.lang.String fileName) throws java.io.IOException
      Name: orderRepeatedInFile Method used to count the number of products from a same order in a csv file when importing it.
      pre: The file name exists.
      post: Number of products from a same order in a csv file determined.
      Parameters:
      codeOrder - - Order code - codeOrder = String, codeOrder != null, codeOrder != ""
      fileName - - File name from the external data in question that will be read - fileName = String, fileName != null, fileName != ""
      Returns:
      An int with the number of products from a same order in the csv file.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - if it cannot find the path file name.

    • exportData

      public void exportData​(java.lang.String fileName, java.lang.String separator) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Name: exportData Method used to export the orders data registered in the system, besides all the correspondent data from the restaurant, the client and the products involved in the order.
      pre: List of orders already initialized with at least one product added to the list of products from the order; list of restaurants already initialized with at least one restaurant registered; list of products already initialized with at least one product registered; list of clients already initialized with at least one client registered.
      post: Exporting process determined of the registered orders in the list of orders from the system.
      Parameters:
      fileName - - File name where the data in question will be written - fileName = String, fileName != null, fileName != ""
      separator - - Separator used between the attributes in the file - separator = String, separator != null, separator != ""
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - - when a file with the specified pathname doesn't exist.

    • saveDataRestaurants

      public void saveDataRestaurants() throws java.io.IOException
      Name: saveDataRestaurants Method used to serialize the list of restaurants of the system.
      pre: List of clients already initialized and a Restaurant object is added to this list or the information of this object is updated.
      post: List of restaurants serialized.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - if it cannot write the file properly while saving.

    • saveDataProducts

      public void saveDataProducts() throws java.io.IOException
      Name: saveDataProducts Method used to serialize the list of products of the system.
      pre: List of products already initialized and a Product object is added to this list or the information of this object is updated.
      post: List of products serialized.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - if it cannot write the file properly while saving.

    • saveDataClients

      public void saveDataClients() throws java.io.IOException
      Name: saveDataClients Method used to serialize the list of clients of the system.
      pre: List of clients already initialized and a Client object is added to this list or the information of this object is updated.
      post: List of clients serialized.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - if it cannot write the file properly while saving.

    • saveDataOrders

      public void saveDataOrders() throws java.io.IOException
      Name: saveDataOrders Method used to serialize the list of orders of the system.
      pre: List of orders already initialized and an Order object is added to this list or the information of this object is updated.
      post: List of orders serialized.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - if it cannot write the file properly while saving.

    • loadData

      public void loadData() throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException, java.io.IOException
      Name: loadData Method used to deserialize all the saved data in the system.
      post: Loading process determined of all the saved data in the system.
      Throws:
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - - if the program tries to load in a class through its String name but no definition for the class with the specified name could be found.
      java.io.IOException - - if it cannot read the file properly while loading.
